_comment: Fill in each field below with your content. All {{PLACEHOLDER}} values in TEMPLATE.html will be replaced by the matching keys here.
DECK_SUBTITLE: Activity Type: Context Brief ¬∑ Claim Ladder ¬∑ Evidence ¬∑ Plan
CTX_ORGANIZATION: Describe the organization: who it is, what it does, where it operates, and who it serves.
CTX_USE_CASE: Describe the primary use case and why it matters ‚Äî what drives value for the end user.
CTX_CROSS_BORDER: Describe which borders are spanned and what crosses them: DATA, MONEY, GOODS, SERVICE, IP.
CTX_TECHNOLOGY: Describe the core technology capability that enables the solution.
CTX_WEDGE: Describe how the cross-border context differs from domestic ‚Äî what local frictions or regulations exist.
CTX_VALUE_THESIS: State the value thesis: if X happens, value is created via Y, constrained by Z.
CROSS_BORDER_FLOWS_SUMMARY: Five cross-border flows: DATA ¬∑ MONEY ¬∑ GOODS ¬∑ SERVICE ¬∑ IP
CLAIM_1_TECH: Describe what the technology automates or enables.
CLAIM_2_WORKFLOW: Describe the workflow change: from X to Y. Identify the new bottleneck.
CLAIM_3_MECHANISM: Explain the causal mechanism: how does the technology change create value.
CLAIM_4_VALUE_CREATION: Quantify value created for each stakeholder (suppliers, buyers, etc.).
CLAIM_5_VALUE_CAPTURE: Describe how value is captured by each party and what sustains it.
CLAIM_6_CROSS_BORDER: Describe cross-border frictions and how they shift value from efficiency to trust/risk reduction.
VALUE_SHIFT_INSIGHT: Same technology, different value mechanism ‚Äî describe what makes it a cross-border application.
EVIDENCE_1_FALSIFY: What would disprove the technology claim
EVIDENCE_1_REQUIRED: What evidence is needed to test it
EVIDENCE_2_FALSIFY: What would disprove the workflow claim
EVIDENCE_2_REQUIRED: What evidence is needed to test it
EVIDENCE_3_FALSIFY: What would disprove the mechanism claim
EVIDENCE_3_REQUIRED: What evidence is needed to test it
EVIDENCE_4_FALSIFY: What would disprove the value creation claim
EVIDENCE_4_REQUIRED: What evidence is needed to test it
EVIDENCE_5_FALSIFY: What would disprove the value capture claim
EVIDENCE_5_REQUIRED: What evidence is needed to test it
EVIDENCE_6_FALSIFY: What would disprove the cross-border claim
EVIDENCE_6_REQUIRED: What evidence is needed to test it
PLAN_MILESTONE: All evidence compiled by Week X ‚Üí synthesis by Date ‚Üí checkpoint Date
